title: Home Of Franklin D Roosevelt National Historic Site: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps             Roosevelt Farm Lane NPS      Vanderbilt Mansion Trail Map  Home of Franklin D. Roosevelt Trail Map  Eleanor's Walk & Top Cottage Trail Map  The Roosevelt Farm Lane Trail Map  Hyde Park Healthy Trails Walkabout Map       Home of Franklin D. Roosevelt NHS site Brochure and Map- Side 1 and Side 2 Hyde Park Trail Map - The Hyde Park Trail connects the three units of the Roosevelt-Vanderbilt National Historic Site.  Open daily during daylight hours. Hyde Park Walkabout Trail Map - Walk 5 Trails on the map and receive a free Walkabout Patch. Roosevelt Farm Lane Trail   - Bicycles are prohibited December - February  - Bicycles are only allowed on the main Lane from March - November.  All other trails are prohibited from bicycle use. History of the Farm Lane Dedicated on November 15, 2008 IN CASE OF EMERGENCY CALL 911 Report Safety & Security Issues to (845) 229-9380.   Report Trail Maintenance Issues to (845) 229-1521 Roosevelt-Vanderbilt NHS Driving Map - Directions for driving between the three units of the Roosevelt-Vanderbilt NHS Vanderbilt Mansion NHS site Brochure and Map- Side 1 and Side 2   Eleanor Roosevelt NHS site Brochure and Map- Side 1 and Side 2
